scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend && npm run sync:backend && npm run sync:node
scripts.build:tauri: npm run build && tauri build && npm run sync:release
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w frontend && npm run typecheck -w backend
